virtual void Util::InterfaceSignal::signal ( GlobalId  gid,
int  event,
ka_uint64_t  value = 0,
const char *  arg = 0 
) throw (IOError) [pure virtual]

Post signal to the specify gid. The gid is the gid that should receive the event.

Parameters:
gid the gid that should receive the event
event the event
value an extra integer parameter
arg an extra string parameter
Exceptions:
IOError if the gid is unreachable or unknown

Implemented in Util::KillService.
